text: you may remember in a previous video I showed  you a live stream where I played this game   called ooblets for the very first time and if you  didn't catch that no worries oobleitz is a life   simulation game that really reminds me of Pokemon  and stardew Valley and also maybe a little bit of   Animal Crossing so in other words it's like the  perfect genre of game for me I've been super into   the farming aspect I love going out and exploring  the town figuring out all the little quests that   I can complete dance battling and collecting  ooblecks which is arguably the best part and   also slowly exploring other regions in the world  this game has a lot going on and I wanted to make   some progress with you today and also give you  a little bit of an update on my farm so this   is the exterior of my home we got a Fresh coat of  paint on her you know no longer living in a nasty   little Shack everybody in the town was making fun
